mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(RSTAR),2) AS RSTARAVG FROM REVIEW WHERE RSCODE=#{storeCode}
SELECT * FROM SAVE WHERE SSCODE=#{storeCode} AND SMCODE=#{mCode}

SELECT R.RCODE,R.RSCODE,R.RCONTENTS,R.RSTAR,TO_CHAR(R.RBOOK,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBOOK,R.RMID,R.RDATE,S.SNAME AS RSNAME FROM REVIEW R, STORE S WHERE RSCODE=#{rsCode} AND R.RSCODE = S.STORECODE ORDER BY RDATE DESC

SELECT R.RCODE,R.RSCODE,R.RCONTENTS,R.RSTAR,TO_CHAR(R.RBOOK,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBOOK,R.RMID,R.RDATE,S.SNAME AS RSNAME FROM REVIEW R, STORE S WHERE RSCODE=#{rsCode} AND R.RSCODE = S.STORECODE ORDER BY RSTAR DESC

SELECT R.RCODE,R.RSCODE,R.RCONTENTS,R.RSTAR,TO_CHAR(R.RBOOK,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RBOOK,R.RMID,R.RDATE,S.SNAME AS RSNAME FROM REVIEW R, STORE S WHERE RSCODE=#{rsCode} AND R.RSCODE = S.STORECODE ORDER BY RSTAR ASC

SELECT BOOKCODE, BOOKSCODE,TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOOKDATE, BOOK9, BOOK10, BOOK11, BOOK12, BOOK13, BOOK14, BOOK15, BOOK16, BOOK17, BOOK18 , BOOK19, BOOK20, BOOK21 FROM MNGBOOK WHERE BOOKSCODE=#{storeCode} AND BOOKDATE=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT BOOKCODE, BOOKSCODE,TO_CHAR(BOOKDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOOKDATE, BOOK9, BOOK10, BOOK11, BOOK12, BOOK13, BOOK14, BOOK15, BOOK16, BOOK17, BOOK18 , BOOK19, BOOK20, BOOK21 FROM MNGBOOK WHERE BOOKSCODE=#{storeCode} AND BOOKDATE=#{bookDate}
